DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study establish feasibility eight-week yoga intervention estimate effect size QoL female patient ovarian , fallopian tube primary peritoneal malignancy receive chemotherapy treatment primary recurrent cancer .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Of Yoga On Quality Of Life Among A Population Of Ovarian/ Fallopian Tube/ Primary Peritoneal Cancer Patients Receiving Chemotherapy : A Feasibility Study
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study determine feasibility implement yoga program among gynecologic cancer patient receive chemotherapy . The investigator conclude feasible due lack participation difficulty recruit patient . Of 25 consented patient , 16 agree participate control arm , 9 agree participate Yoga class . Three ( 3 ) 9 change mind withdrew consent . Of 6 remain patient , 3 attend least 1 8 class .
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm diagnosis epithelial ovarian/fallopian tube/primary peritoneal cancer Participant must age 18 old Participants must 6 week postsurgery Participant must currently receive chemotherapy begin regimen within next four week Participant must willing attend intervention session All subject must give sign , informed consent prior registration study . Participant practice yoga 4 time last year Participant surgical procedure schedule 8 week would part intervention Participant ECOG performance status less equal two
